name: remotion-videos
description: 刷題王 Marketing Videos - Scene 3 & 4 Motion Graphics

scripts.render:cards: npx remotion render src/index.ts Scene3-ExamCards out/scene3-exam-cards.mp4
scripts.render:paper: npx remotion render src/index.ts Scene3-PaperToDigital out/scene3-paper-to-digital.mp4
scripts.render:outro: npx remotion render src/index.ts Scene4-BrandOutro out/scene4-brand-outro.mp4
scripts.render:full: npx remotion render src/index.ts EP4-Scene3and4 out/ep4-scene3-and-4.mp4
scripts.render:all: npm run render:cards && npm run render:paper && npm run render:outro && npm run render:full
